attributes.additional_details:
On a corner and junctions pedestrians will Cyclists taking up full lanes preventing vehicles to safely over take casing unnecessary congestion aspecially during rush our and in large city's bringing them to a stand still them making its inadequate for emergency service to get to destination putting lives at risk.
Cyclist not needing to use lanes built and paid for by other road users rendering them pointless and waist of money that they did not pay for and i do have more to add...

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607153
